creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly acquired by the Center with the kind assistance of Carol Brooks and Prof. James Cahill in honor of George Schlenker
description: small landscape: thicket of dense trees along a path; small house at R within trees; hint of mountain at UL; inscription URQ
inscription:
Signature, Inscription, Mark, Seal, and Stickers

URQ: [ 秋山孤邨 ] (Solitary hamlet in the autumn mountains)
markings: back L when rolled, in pen: [Gyokudo]; faded seal URQ; URC: [ 酔郷 ] {Suikyō}; round white sticker R roller end: [SJ/80]; bright yellow round sticker R roller end: [E8]
title: Isolated Village in Autumn Mountains
